alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Garden; Grant; Hooker; Keith; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:29AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Arthur, southeastern Grant, northern Keith, southern Hooker, southeastern Garden, northwestern Logan, McPherson and southern Thomas Counties through 430 AM CDT/330 AM MDT/... At 329 AM CDT/229 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Swan Lake to 6 miles northeast of Lewellen. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Tryon, Lewellen, Swan Lake, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Flatts, Cogill Lake, Green Lake, Bucktail Lake, Three Mile Lake, Shimmons Lake, Haythorn Lake, Lena, Sand Puddin Lake, Big Lamunyon Flats, McKeag, Calora, East Cody Lake, Jensen Lake and Sand Beach Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 105 and 138. Highway 92 between mile markers 115 and 121, and between mile markers 165 and 206. Highway 97 between mile markers 32 and 54. Highway 83 between mile markers 134 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT/300 AM MDT/ for the Panhandle of and west central Nebraska.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Garden; Grant; Hooker; Keith; McPherson; Thomas
